alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 12 at 3:00PM EST until January 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 10 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, the Atlantic facing beaches including Ocean City and Assateague. In Virginia, the Atlantic facing barrier island beaches of Accomack and Northampton counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
